title: Earth Live Watch Face
summary: Earth Live Wallpaper on a connected watch !
description: See the earth rotating (1 round / min for now but speed will be adjustable) and the night/day shadow evolving in realtime.Lots of settings from Earth Live Wallpaper will be included, more than 500 backgrounds, 200 planets, and cool features.
descriptionHTML:
See the earth rotating (1 round / min for now but speed will be adjustable) and the night/day shadow evolving in realtime.
Lots of settings from Earth Live Wallpaper will be included, more than 500 backgrounds, 200 planets, and cool features.
comments: The best!  Except. .. It's animated and gorgeous. But the speeds settings don't stick. The rapid fire ads in setup are exceptionally annoying. I'd pay to rid them. Sometimes earth vanishes.  Sometimes digital time shows (even though it's off in settings). No time on dim screen.  I wish i could adjust the time before dim to 30, sec., as in Tourbibling. Fix all this for 5 stars. Stock T-mobile Note5 to Tag Heuer Connected.
Won't even load, doesn't work for me or any of my friends who've downloaded it.
